verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%>

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> all who enter <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
"This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things. <S%H6944><s%>

When the camp <S%H4264><s%> moves forward, <S%H5265><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall go in, <S%H935><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and they shall take down <S%H3381><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen, <S%H4539><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Testimony with it, <S%H5715><s%>

and shall put <S%H5414><s%> a covering <S%H3681><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin <S%H5785><s%> on it, <S%H6566><s%> and shall spread over <S%H4605><s%> it a cloth <S%H899><s%> all <S%H3632><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in its poles. <S%H905><s%>

"On the table <S%H7979><s%> of show bread <S%H6440><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a blue <S%H8504><s%> cloth, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> on it the dishes, <S%H7086><s%> the spoons, <S%H3709><s%> the bowls, <S%H4518><s%> and the cups <S%H7184><s%> with which <S%H5262><s%> to pour out; <S%H8548><s%> and the continual bread shall be on it. <S%H3899><s%>

They shall spread <S%H6566><s%> on them a scarlet <S%H8438><s%> cloth, <S%H899><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the same with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in its poles. <S%H905><s%>

"They shall take <S%H3947><s%> a blue <S%H8504><s%> cloth, <S%H899><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> of the light, <S%H3974><s%> and its lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and its snuffers, <S%H4457><s%> and its snuff dishes, <S%H4289><s%> and all its oil <S%H8081><s%> vessels, <S%H3627><s%> with which they minister to it. <S%H8334><s%>
They shall put <S%H5414><s%> it and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%> within a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> it on the frame. <S%H4132><s%>

"On the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a blue <S%H8504><s%> cloth, <S%H899><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in its poles. <S%H905><s%>

"They shall take <S%H3947><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of ministry, <S%H8335><s%> with which they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them in a blue <S%H8504><s%> cloth, <S%H899><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> them with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on the frame. <S%H4132><s%>
"They shall take away the ashes <S%H1878><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> a purple <S%H713><s%> cloth on it. <S%H899><s%>

They shall put <S%H5414><s%> on it all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> with which they minister <S%H8334><s%> about it, <S%H4289><s%> the fire pans, the flesh hooks, <S%H4207><s%> the shovels, <S%H3257><s%> and the basins; <S%H4219><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> on it a covering <S%H3681><s%> of <S%H8476><s%> sealskin, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> in its poles. <S%H905><s%>

"When Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> have finished <S%H3615><s%> covering <S%H3680><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and all the furniture <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> as the camp <S%H4264><s%> moves forward; <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that, <S%H1121><s%> the sons of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it: <S%H5060><s%> but they shall not touch the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> lest they die. <S%H4191><s%> These things are the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

"The duty <S%H6486><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> the requirements <S%H6486><s%> of all the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and of all that is in it, <S%H6944><s%> the sanctuary, and its furnishings. <S%H3627><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Don't <S%H3772><s%> cut off the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the Levites; <S%H3881><s%>

but thus do <S%H6213><s%> to them, <S%H2421><s%> that they may live, and not die, <S%H4191><s%> when they approach <S%H5066><s%> to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things: <S%H6944><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall go in, <S%H935><s%> and appoint <S%H7760><s%> them <S%H376><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his service <S%H5656><s%> and to his burden; <S%H4853><s%>
but they shall not go in <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> even for a moment, <S%H1104><s%> lest they die. <S%H4191><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> also, <S%H1><s%> by their fathers' houses, <S%H1004><s%> by their families; <S%H4940><s%>

you shall count <S%H6485><s%> them from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old; <S%H1121><s%> all who enter in <S%H935><s%> to wait <S%H6633><s%> on the service, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
"This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> in serving and in bearing burdens: <S%H4853><s%>

they shall carry <S%H5375><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> its covering, <S%H4372><s%> and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of sealskin <S%H8476><s%> that is above <S%H4605><s%> on it, <S%H4539><s%> and the screen for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>

and the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> which is by the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and around <S%H5439><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of their service, <S%H5656><s%> and whatever shall be done <S%H6213><s%> with them. <S%H5647><s%> Therein shall they serve.

At the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> in all their burden, <S%H4853><s%> and in all their service; <S%H5656><s%> and you shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> their duty <S%H4931><s%> to them in all their responsibilities. <S%H4853><s%>

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and their duty <S%H4931><s%> shall be under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>
"As for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> you shall number <S%H6485><s%> them by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses; <S%H1004><s%>

you shall count <S%H6485><s%> them from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> everyone who enters <S%H935><s%> on the service, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

This is the duty <S%H4931><s%> of their burden, <S%H4853><s%> according to all their service <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>'s boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%>

and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H134><s%> and their sockets, and their pins, <S%H3489><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> with all their instruments, <S%H3627><s%> and with all their service: <S%H5656><s%> and by name <S%H8034><s%> you shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the duty <S%H4931><s%> of their burden. <S%H4853><s%>

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> according to all their service, <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%>

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> everyone who entered <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> for work <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> all who served <S%H5647><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> their families, <S%H4940><s%> and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%>

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> everyone who entered <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> for work <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>

even those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4940><s%> by their families, by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty. <S%H7970><s%>

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> all who served <S%H5647><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%>

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> everyone who entered <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> for work <S%H5656><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>
even those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families, <S%H4940><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

All those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> and by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%>

from thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even to fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> everyone who entered <S%H935><s%> in to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of service, <S%H5656><s%> and the work of bearing burdens <S%H4853><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>
even those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H8083><s%> were eight thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty. <S%H8084><s%>

According to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> they were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> according to his service, <S%H5656><s%> and according to his burden. <S%H4853><s%> Thus were they numbered <S%H6485><s%> by him, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
